entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8Â°C

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
